page.title: 05HOMELIFE
page.content: HOUSES (TYPES). The homes in the area are well maintained and are roughly of two categories. Scattered small farm houses, working farms, and the small hamlets of the area, with the farm workers cottages or cottages that have been modernised, and extended, for the commuters living in the area. SERVICES. The area benefits from an electricity supply, brought by pylon and has mains water, but there is no gas supply or sewage system, for the latter, homes depend on septic tanks and the 'night soil service'. TRANSPORT. There is a bus service (no 76), which runs four times a day between Ruthin and Denbigh.
